Ukusekwa kwamaqela oPhuhliso lwezoQoqosho lukaMasipala weBhunga leSithili

AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



IZIXHOBO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO






INKCAZELO:

Ukusekwa kwamaqela oPhuhliso lwezoQoqosho kwinqanaba looMasipala kuza kunceda abasemagunyeni apho ukuba banyusele uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho lwalapho kwimimandla yabo.Abancedisi baBaphathi boPhuhliso lwezoQoqosho bangancedisa abasemagunyeni balapho ngokuthi:
* ukunikezela ngomhlahla-ndlela wobuchule othatyathwe kwimigaqo-nkqubo yomthetho wamaSebe amaCandelo okanye iinkqubo
* baxhase ekwakheni ubuchule babalawuli balapho ngokuthi banikezele ngolwazi lobugcisa nangenkxaso, okanye amava amaCandelo ukuncedisa ekwakheni nasekuphumezeni imigaqo-nkqubo kaMasipala, ubuchule kunye nezicwangciso.
* bakhokhelwe ziziCwangciso zoPhuhliso eziHlanganyelweyo zikaMasipala ekwabiweni koncedo kwinqanaba lendawo ethile.
